department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada, Cowansville Institution, is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a new differential for Yale Veracitor 120 forklift, including delivery..
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Summary of Tender

Title: Request for Proposal (RFP) – Differential for Yale Veracitor 120 Forklift

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invite bids for the acquisition of a new differential for Yale Veracitor 120 forklift, including delivery, for the Cowansville Institution.

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4354787411
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4354787411
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 5, 2024, 2:00 p.m. (EST)
* **Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Price ( Lowest price will be selected)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority:** Alina Cocieru (elle-la, she-her), PSPC/SPAC
* **Contact Email:** [alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Information URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18319505](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18319505)

## Procurement Category and Notice Type

The tender is issued under the procurement category of Goods (GD) and the notice type is Request for Proposal (RFP). The selected method is competitive, open bidding.

**Key Highlights**

* The tender requires the delivery of a new differential for a Yale Veracitor 120 forklift.
* The institution is located in Cowansville.
* Various trade agreements are applicable, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The procurement method is competitive, with the lowest price selected as the criterium.
